[https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/actualites/A14389?lang=en](https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/actualites/A14389?lang=en)

== ğŸ¥¾ğŸ”µ Hike: BelvÃ©dÃ¨re ChÃ¢teau Julien from near Villard-de-Lans

* ğŸ”µ Ok for regular hikers with slippery/ice-ready shoes
* ğŸ”´ Some paths can be too steep for noobs with slippery mud/ice

We will do an afternoon+night hike in Vercors. I want to enjoy fullmoon during the night. So don't forget to bring warm tea/coffee, warm clothes and so on. Also don't forget to bring good non-slippery shoes as we may encounter icy paths. Also bringing hiking poles is a good idea to prevent sliding on ice. Since we will hike during the night, make sure to bring head lamp (or any lamp) and make sure you have charged your phone in case you want to use its flashlight to walk during the night.
Rough plan:
\- Start the hike at around 1 pm\.
\- Reach "Scialet de Malaterre" at around 3\-3:30 pm\.
[https://maps.app.goo.gl/E1bey3WsWpSGBjL46](https://maps.app.goo.gl/E1bey3WsWpSGBjL46)
\- Reach Chateau Julien at around 4 pm\.
[https://maps.app.goo.gl/FB2Dod5RffzrN5Mr6](https://maps.app.goo.gl/FB2Dod5RffzrN5Mr6)
\- Reach the viewpoint at around 4:30 pm\.
[https://maps.app.goo.gl/dwddfGRFxNTvG3zq9](https://maps.app.goo.gl/dwddfGRFxNTvG3zq9)
\- Enjoy the view and the sunset till 5:30\-6 pm\.
\- Reach the second viewpoint at around 7 pm\.
[https://maps.app.goo.gl/Jdb5uLATaMDFWwZo9](https://maps.app.goo.gl/Jdb5uLATaMDFWwZo9)
\- Return back to the cars at around 8 pm\.

ğŸ—ºï¸ Topo & GPX track: [https://shorturl.at/bgUW6](https://shorturl.at/bgUW6) (click Export > GPX)

ğŸ“² Download GPX on your phone (Tuto: [https://binnette.github.io/GAC](https://binnette.github.io/GAC/))
ğŸ“ Distance: 12.5km
â±ï¸ Time: \~4 hours of hike
ğŸ“ˆ D+: 570 m

* ğŸš¶â€â™€ï¸ğŸš¶â€â™‚ï¸ GAC is about hiking ğŸ¥¾ and making friends ğŸ¤—, NOT flirting â›”

* ğŸ’º Seats in car(s) are limited, only subscribe if sure to join
* âŒ Unsubscribe or ğŸ’¬ message if canâ€™t join
* ğŸš— Drivers: message me ASAP if you canâ€™t join
* ğŸ’Ÿ You are responsible for your own health and security

== ğŸ’ What to bring ğŸ’ ==

* ğŸ¥¾ Hiking snow/ice ready shoes
* ğŸ¥¢ Hiking poles to prevent sliding on ice
* ğŸ§¤ Winter gloves, ğŸ§¥ jacket, [ğŸ§£](https://wprock.fr/t/emoji/cold-face/) scarf, ğŸ§¢ beanie,...
* ğŸ§ƒ Water (1-2L) + ğŸ« Snacks + ğŸ¥— Lunch
* ğŸµ Thermos with hot tea/coffee
* â„ï¸ğŸŒ§ï¸ Cold & rain gear
* ğŸ’¡ Headlamp or any lamp to walk during the night
* ğŸŒ Sunscreen, ğŸ˜ Sunglasses, ğŸ¤ğŸ§Š Lip balm

Event:298503169.title: ğŸ¿ Ski: Ski for NOOB 2024 - Session 1 â›·
Event:298503169.description:
ğŸ’¡ Read full page by clicking on "Read more/Lire la suite".
Subscribing = Joining = Accepting the rules (See rule section)

ğŸ”º This event is dedicated to beginners. If you are a good skier, leave your seat for somebody that never ski before. Also you can take the bus and join us or go to a bigger station.

ğŸ‘€ I am not a ski teacher, but I will teach you the basics.

== â­â­ Updates â­â­ ==

* More cars = more seats. Seats: Albin (5), Thomas (5), RÃ©mi (5), Hamid (5)
* 14 by car / 1 by bus : Faty
* **Didn't answer the "bus or car?" question : _**

== ğŸ—¨ï¸ EN/FR ğŸ—¨ï¸ ==
ğŸ¦…/ğŸ“ : we speak English/French in all our events. Don't worry if your English/French is not that good. Nos Ã©vÃ¨nements sont en Anglais et FranÃ§ais. Ne soyez pas inquiets si votre niveau d'anglais n'est pas "suffisant".

== ğŸ¿ Ski: Ski for NOOB 2024 - Session 1 â›· ==
ğŸŸ¨ DO NOT BRING YOUR SKI. Except if you have your own car (there is not enough place in my car). We will rent ski directly at the station.

Meet at **event time time SHARP** in parking "Esplanade du Souvenir FranÃ§ais" near Parc Paul Mistral:

* â° [https://osm.org/go/0CASJNZuW?m=](https://osm.org/go/0CASJNZuW?m=)
* â° [https://goo.gl/maps/qPgvTu2icZmE1Ke97](https://goo.gl/maps/qPgvTu2icZmE1Ke97)

We ride our cars for about 45m. Then park our car(s) directly at the ski station :

* ğŸ…¿ï¸ [https://osm.org/go/0Aqu4biBm?m=](https://osm.org/go/0Aqu4biBm?m=)
* ğŸ…¿ï¸ [https://maps.app.goo.gl/C9cpyrpDXZqD9XPK9](https://maps.app.goo.gl/C9cpyrpDXZqD9XPK9)

== ğŸ¿ Ski rentingğŸ¿ ==
We rent ski directly at ski station. The shop is open 9am-12:30pm and 1pm-5pm. So we will stop ski near 4:30pm to bring the ski to the shop.

Renting Ski + helmet \~25â‚¬ (Detail here: [https://s.42l.fr/kUBuCnzS](https://s.42l.fr/kUBuCnzS))

== ğŸ’² Ski Pass ğŸ’² ==

* âœ… 14â‚¬ "1st track pass" ( beginner 1 day)
* 19â‚¬ "2nd track pass" (intermediate 1 day)
* 24â‚¬ "adult pass" (full station 1 day)

Map & price: [https://skipass.lansenvercors.com/](https://skipass.lansenvercors.com/)

If you are happy with your "ski teacher" you can help him (me) pay his (my) ski pass. Thank you ğŸ˜‡ğŸ’™

=== ğŸš— share 5â‚¬ ===
Car share will cost 5â‚¬ per person (fuel + "compensation" to get more drivers).

=== ğŸšŒ Join by bus 13.80â‚¬ ===

1. Take bus T64 at 7:40am in "Grenoble Gare RoutiÃ¨re". Go down at "Lans-en-Vercors Office de Tourisme (OT)". Cost: 6.90â‚¬ (Pay with phone by sending 3z to 93038 when getting on board)
2. Take the free bus (navette gratuite) at 8:55am from "Lans-en-Vercors Office de Tourisme (OT)" to "Montagne de Lans"
3. Enjoy your skiing day
4. Either try hitchhiking for free or take the same 2 buses back. Bus to Lans at 15:08, 16:04 & 17:20. Bus Lans-Grenoble T64: 16;50, 18:05 & 19:00 or T65: 15:50 & 18:10 (6.90â‚¬ again)

=== For drivers ğŸš— ===
Drivers needs (â—**mandatory**â—):

* â›„Either 4 winter or 4 four seasons tires
* ğŸ”—Either 2 car snow chains (\~25â‚¬ at Carrefour)

[https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/actualites/A14389?lang=en](https://www.service-public.fr/particuliers/actualites/A14389?lang=en)

== ğŸ’¡ Rules ğŸ’¡ ==

* ğŸš¶â€â™€ï¸ğŸš¶â€â™‚ï¸ GAC is about hiking ğŸ¥¾ and making friends BUT NOT about flirting or speed dating â›”
* Don't throw any dump ğŸš® in nature even egg shell ğŸ¥š, fruit pelt ğŸŒ, ... ğŸŒ³ â¤ï¸ You
* Subscribe = you are 100% that you want to join. When you no longer want to join, please unsubscribe to leave your seat for the next one. And that way we won't wait for you in the morning.
* Subscribe on the waiting list. Maybe more cars will be available ğŸš—
* Don't be late or at least send a message here.
* Since seats in cars are "rare", please do not subscribe if you are not 100% sure to join
* If you finally can't join us, please unsubscribe from the event ğŸ’œ That way, we won't wait for you ğŸ’œ
* If you are a driver and can't join, please send me a message through meetup ASAP, that way I can remove available seats ğŸš—
* ğŸš— Don't forget to bring the good amount of money for car share. And please don't forget to pay your driver.
* ğŸ’Ÿ You are responsible of your own health and security

== â” What do you need â” ==

* ğŸ†” ID card or "residence permit" to rent ski at shop
* â›” NO SKI (I don't have place in my car. We will rent them at the shop)
* ğŸ§¢ A ski helmet (mandatory, rent one at the shop for 5â‚¬)
* ğŸ§¥ Snow/Warm clothes
* ğŸ§¤ Ski gloves
* ğŸ‘– Ski pants
* ğŸ§¦ Ski socks or big warm socks
* ğŸ¥¾ Any good/non slippery shoes to walk on snow/ice
* ğŸ§ƒ Water + ğŸ¥ª Food for lunch + ğŸ« Some snack
* ğŸŒ Sun-cream / ğŸ˜ Sun glasses
* ğŸ’ Backpack to carry food, water, sun-cream, ...
* ğŸ˜ smile / ğŸ˜Š Happiness
* ğŸ’µ Cash for car share (bring the correct change)

***

If you have any questions, please ask!

See you! Albin from GAC.

For more activities (cinema, concert, etc), join our Telegram group. Just ask me by message on meetup or IRL (in real life).
